review_body: Love it, very powerful for something that small. Wish it could fold up, but still it is an awesome product.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer; pink
review_body: I really like this Conair hairdryer.  I've had it for several months and use it most every day.  It's easy to use, dries my hair quickly and I like that I can set the temperature and speed separately and that the cord retracts.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: Great blow dryer. It does the trick and dries your hair quickly. I like the little 'Cold Shot' button as well.

product_title: panasonic kurukuru curling hair dryer eh-ka60-k black | ac100-120v/200-240v (japan model)
review_body: Works great... Better than advertised! I would/have recomended this product to others and it works like a dream on my daughters hair too!

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
review_body: I was very pleasantly surprised by this hair dryer! I am not willing to spend $50 or more on a fancy hair dryer, so I hoped this one would be close enough. It works great - better than expected! Dries fast and gets plenty hot. It comes with several attachments which fit securely and don't fall off. Also love the miles-long cord so I can stand anywhere in the bathroom while drying my hair!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_headline: Does what it says it does

I bought this after my last Conair blow dryer pooped out.

Pro: dries quickly, silky, smooth hair
Con: none yet

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: We're in the health care industry, often times after our patients undergo MRI and other brain imaging procedures, they need to shampoo their hair. This product is just right! Works fast!

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body:
I recently bought this Onei Mk-l Air Ionque Hair Dryer and it's the best ever! It arrived so fast to my door and I use it on my shampooed hair and it dries fast and my hair is not dried out like my other hair dryer.. My hair actualy feels like silk..very smooth... Thank you..
Linda
RI

product_title: sunbeam/oster 1500 watt wall mounted hair dryer.
review_body: This was to be a replacement for a Sunbeam dryer we had in our home which is now working. Surprise!  We arenow  thinking of putting it in our vacation condo.  These dryers are absolutely excellent and we will buy another as a backup in case you all stop manufacturing them.  Highly recommend this product!

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: I have used these little wall-hung hair dryers while on vacation and wondered if I would like one at home.  I DO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  I tossed my Remington and LOVE this little, convenient giant of a hair-dryer!  I think I am drying my hair in HALF the time I previously took.  WHY didn't I buy this sooner???  :)

product_title: conair 1875 watt dual voltage folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Nice size, convenient for travel, powerfull and light. Dual voltage is very beneficial if you travel to Europe. Very happy with the purchase.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: A great dryer for me (I have arthritis), not heavy and does all I need for  drying and styling my hair. Bargain priced too.

product_title: oster professional wall hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: I enjoy using this product.  Dries long hair very fast.  I have no problem recommending this product to a friend.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: We were concerned to begin with because of a post about weight but found that this was in fact the perfect size for us. It seems to be well built. Our issue with a different brand had been that the cord would break where the cord met the handle and it seems as though this one the cord is a little more protected. We will see how it holds up over time but as of right now I'm very hopeful.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_body:
This is a great hair dryer. It is quiet and has a powerful fan blower. It has 3 settings each for heat and blower speed.
There is also an instant cool button to cool down the air no matter what heat setting it is on. It has a long cord which
is nice. It is a litlle larger in size than some and somewhat heavier. However, the heat and blower features and quietness
more than offset this.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: My daughter in law recommended this blow dryer, so I purchased it.  It dries my hair in half the time than my other blow dryer.  It's light weight and easy to use, yet powerful!

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: I love this.  It's just what I wanted when I decided to buy a blowdryer.  Fast shipping, too.  Good buy.

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_body: Fabulous little blow dryer. Small, compact, great for packing and travel but still has plenty of power to get the job done quickly.  Worth the money, seems sturdy like it will go the distance!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: A bit on the heavy side but very well made.  Wide range of heat and blower settings.  Works great!  When was the last time that you bought an electrical appliance for under $30 that had a FOUR YEAR WARRANTY???

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_headline: Works just as it's suppose to
review_body: I had no problems with this, it works; the diffuser was what I really wanted (the concentrator I haven't tried) and that works too.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1200 watt folding hair dryer
review_body: This dryer is easy to hold and has alot of power and force.  I have thick hair and it dries my hair very quickly.  A great buy!

product_title: conair bb075w pro blackbird 2000-watt hair dryer
review_body: This is my second Blackbird.  I had the first one for 10 years before it gave out.  I have very thick hair and it takes about 20 minutes of drying to style and dry my hair.  I'm hoping I have this one as long as the first one.

product_title: extracompact twinturbo 3500 2000 watt compact professional hair dryer
review_body: A stylist recommended this to me as it is the model they use.  It is lightweight, compared to what I had been using, is super powerful and does my hair faster.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: Love this dryer.have been using the same kind for several years. Lots of power for straight hair and low is also great for curly hair.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: I read reviews on this that said the night light was too bright.  I don't agree at all; besides, I would not recommend ever leaving a blow-dryer plugged in all the time.  It's a great little dryer.  No more having to keep in a drawer, taking it out, putting it back, every time I want to use it.  It was a snap to put together and get on the wall.

product_title: conair pro styler bonnet hair dryer, white
review_body: I been using Conair hair dryers for years, but this one is the worst hair Dryer I ever used.  It burns your hair. I didn't have the box anymore, or I would have returned it.

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body: This blowdryer has great wind power and delivers a lot of heat - both make it great at styling my very curly hair.  It is a reasonable weight and fits comfortably in my small hands, which makes maneuvering it easy.  I only wish it came with a diffuser attachment.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I love the size, power & settings! Also, the browdryer has a really nice look & is powerful too. I feel it gets hot enough on the hottest setting, medium heat on the medium setting & low heat on the low setting. I also like the cool air button too. I'm Black with relaxed African american hair and it works just fine for me.

product_title: conair pro hair dryer
review_body: 2000 watts makes a big difference in how quick n easy straightening your hair is. Perfect for coarser hair types.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I have fine & thick hair and this product has cut down 50% of drying time.  It is a great product for anyone who has limited luxury time to spare.

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)
review_body:
Just received The Elchim Professional 2001 2000 Watt Classic Hair Dryer and am very pleased with product. Dryer is quiet and hair dried much quicker than before.
Would highly recommend!!!!!

product_title: revlon 1875w volumizing turbo hair dryer
review_body: This dryer is powerful but light weight and easy to handle.  The diffuser is large and the settings make styling easy.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: This blow dryer is compact, so it is very easy to travel with. It has a lot of power and dries my hair very fast. It is also very cute!

product_title: andis hangup 1600w hair dryer with cord hanger

product_title: elchim professional 2001 classic hair dryer (colors may vary)

product_title: andis hangup 1600w wall mount hair dryer

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body: I love it! Dries hair so fast! Very nice condition. Great I can remove filter and clean it! I think this will keep it working efficiently for longer!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I like that this hair drier is quiet. It has multiple heat settiing with a good high heat setting.  It is comfortable fit for my hand and not heavy which makes blow drying less toil some. Although not heavy it does not lack in quality and durability.  I have owned several dryers and refused to setlle for a poor quality. This is superior in quality performance and durability compared to the typical Conair brands.I have owned for several months now and have no complaints and works as well as the day I purchased  If looking for quite and quality I would recommend Remington.  Well worth it.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: I LOVE THIS HAIR DRYER. If you have straight, no-volume hair, this hair dryer is PERFECT. It gives me the only volume my hair will ever see. I have two houses and have one of these in each. My first one lasted me 4 years before I took it to Europe and all of the added voltage was too much. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

product_title: proversa jwm6cf wall caddy hair dryer with 2-speed and 3-heat settings, 1600-watts, white finish
review_body: Bought this to replace an old Sunbeam that burned out. Looks exactly like the Sunbeam one and even used same mounting plate already on the wall. Nice!!

product_title: andis hangup 1600w hair dryer with cord hanger
review_body: This is a very small dryer but with a BIG punch!  I was shocked how much power this little dynamo has... I can dry my hair faster than I ever could with my larger hand held dryer.  It is perfect for a small wall space and keeps my counter clutter free...Highly recomended!

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body:
This is the second one of this model dryer- revlon travel 1875w I have purchased. I bought this one for my mother because she was dying for it since I got it and it worked so well. I bought mine in 2009 and it is still going strong! I have pretty thick long hair, about chest length, and this dryer is by far the best one I've ever had. I always bought Conair in the past but saw this on sale and decided to get it to travel with. It ended up replacing my full size dryer because it works better than my big Conair, dries my hair super fast (5 minutes or so) and is really light. I dry my hair almost everyday in the winter and only a couple times a week in the summer to give you an idea of how much I use it and it still works like a charm. Revlon for me from now on.

Summary- best little hair dryer you will buy. Powerful, light, and great value!

product_title: andis hangup 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_headline: bought two and 1 was good and other had issues.
review_body: Low air on the first but the 2nd was great. It is in the guest bath so know one evr has to pack the monster blow dryer.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I have only used the diffuser and low speed setting for this but I love that it sends only cool air so I get the right type of drying power. I have been using this every other day for a couple weeks and I haven't noticed any damage to my hair. It is also consistently the same temperature so I don't get a mix of warm / cold air. The cold blast button I think still works but I'll have to read the instructions again on whether you hold it down or just push the button. If it's that you just push the button, I don't notice it getting any cooler after depressing it. Other than the mysterious button, this has been great. It's easy to hold and doesn't slip in my hands at all. The cord doesn't wrap itself up while I'm using it, which was an issue with my last blowdryer. It was constantly coiling up when I lifted it. I do not wrap the cord around the body of my tools, so this was especially annoying. This is my first diffusing hairdryer, so I cannot compare it to anything else but I will say that when its last day comes, I am happy enough to buy the same product.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: E eReally worth the money paid I'm happy with the product a must buy my top list loved it wow

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Fully trust in the brand and the model powerful and good

product_title: andis 81290 tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: I first used this brand of dryer at  Barona Casino hotel. It worked so good I ordered one as soon as I arrived home. I thought it would be really expensive but it is not.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: Does it's job. Temperature settings are awesome. You won't regret buying it. I havent tried in any of the extra style dryer.

product_title: conair pro styler bonnet hair dryer, white
review_body: I love sitting under the dryer and being able to read or do handwork and getting my hair dried hands free. I do wish it had 3 settings instead of just the two. It is either hot or cold and I would love to have medium as it does get quite hot but I love being able to do something with my hands rather than holding the dryer.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: I have had one since 1998 and loved the size and ease of use mounted on the wall, so when it started acting up and I needed to replace it... I was not sure if I would be able to find a replacement that I liked as much.  But this one was perfect!!!  I didn't even need to remove the old wall mounting hardware, it connected right to my old hardware!!  Very happy.

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body: worked great!!!!!!!!!!!!  better then my other ones and i had a lot of them ranging from 10- 100$$$ this one is the best so far!!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: So I was at a hotel over the weekend and they had one of these hair dryers.  I thought "Wow!  This thing is quiet and powerful!  I need one."  Mind you, my old dryer was almost 6-7 years old so it was due time.  For the price I was skeptical but holy moly is this thing awesome!  I'm one of those "I hate washing my hair b/c it takes forever to dry" kind of gals and this bad boy had it completely dry in a few minutes.  It's heavier than my last one but who the heck cares because I don't lose hearing after use and I'm done in a few minutes vs 15 with the previous one.  So yeah... Clearly I recommend this. :)

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_headline: This is a great product for home as well as hotel!
review_body: This is a great product for home as well as hotel! I have one in each of my 3 bathrooms!!

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline lightweight professional hair dryer, red (3600)
review_body: I have frizzy and curly hair so it is hard to find a blow dryer than can straighten easily and quickly. This pro blow dryer definitely does the trick. It is strong and gets the job done.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Good and powerful. I think it is enough for boys and guys to dry their hair within 2 or 3 minutes.

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline lightweight professional hair dryer, red (3600)
review_body: Great price. It's a good brand, I did my research and its easy to control because of the different heatsettings .i recommend . Others brands are expensive when you could just get this product for less.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_body: The greatest thing this dryer has is the retractable cord - and, of course the varied choices for temperature and blowing power!

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body:
I originally came onto Amazon to search for a dryer that I had found in a store that was out of stock. Once logging on, I decided to peruse the selection of hair dryers in the same price range. This dryer had the largest number of reviews and the highest rating. I was replacing an old dryer and was looking for something that would dry my hair quickly and leave it looking smooth.

Other reviewers commented on how great the Onei dryer was, citing it's speed in drying, it's ionic component that left hair smooth, and several even mentioned how quiet the dryer was. The dryer arrived faster than anticipated and I was in love the first time I used it!! It did dry my hair quickly (the same or faster than other dryers), my hair doesn't require a pass through with a flat iron on most days as it usually did, and it's actually REALLY quiet (like, abnormally so). While I don't have to worry about waking anyone up, it's quiet enough not to drown out the phone ringing or my music playing while I get ready.

The attachments are great...as is the long cord. I really love this product and hope it lasts as long as other reviewers said it did!

product_title: remington d3710 ceramic fast finish dual fan turbo hair dryer, 1875 watts
review_body: I got this hairdryer because it was cheaper but still had great reviews. I would agree with some of the reviews in that there is not a very good medium heat, its either too hot or cool, but I still think it works great. I love it!

product_title: elevate by andis 80405 professional lightweight tourmaline ceramic ionic 1875 watts hair dryer
review_body: This is a truly fast dryer. It met or exceed my expectations. I have had it for about 6 months and love it.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_headline: Truly awesome hair dryer! Very pleased...
review_body: Really love this hair dryer.  It is super lightweight and sleek.  Dries hair quickly and easily.  The price was on target and the shipping was ultra fast -- very pleased with the seller as well. Highly recommend product and seller! Kudos to both :)

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_headline: 1875-Watt Mini Hair Dryer. Dual Voltage -- love it
review_body: I bought one of these in 2001 for a 3 week trip to Europe.  It's still going strong.  So, I purchased this for a young friend, just graduating from high school and headed to Spain for some future studies. Hopefully, she will have as good luck with her's as I have had!

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
This is the only hairdryer I've ever seen that has a cool blower setting as well as a cool shot button. I like the cool blower for finishing when the day is hot. I keep pressing the cool shot button accidentally, however, because it's so darn convenient. The cool shot button is exactly where my thumb naturally rests and I have to keep that in mind. The cord is shorter than I'd like, and a good bit shorter than my last dryer. The sliding controls aren't wonderful. The friction ridges are quite flat and the two slides mesh so well and are so narrow that my thumb can't tell them apart. I have to press those flat ridges so hard that it hurts my thumb, so I use my "off" hand to slide the controls. There's some kind of thin, plastic-like finish that's slowly peeling off, but that doesn't bother me at all.

My last dryer was a Black & Decker. It was very small and compact and did the job for many years, possibly as much as 20 years. I do still wish I could have replaced it with the same thing.

All this sounds like complaining, I know, but they're trivial complaints (except the cord length). I've never had a diffuser attachment before but I found it worth learning to use. I used to dry and style my short, curly hair in about a minute on the hot setting, but now the diffuser and the warm setting do it just as fast and better. The Conair hot setting is pretty hot, so if you need that you'll be happy. Best of all is that, even in the winter, my hair never gets flyaway with static electricity.

I've had this Conair less than a year, so I can't comment on its durability.

BTW, I bought this upon the recommendation of Consumer Reports. They called it a good value and I certainly agree.

I've had it almost 4 years now and it's still trouble-free.

product_title: turbo power megaturbo 3000 professional hair dryer
review_body: Long and heavy duty cord, powerful, great attachments, enough settings and the buttons are a little recessed so you can't mistakenly hit them while you're drying.  Fees sturdy but not too heavy.  Good product for the buck.

product_title: andis tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: Never heard of this brand before, but found it in a boutique hotel and was very pleased with so I ordered it from Amazon.  Really reduces drying time which results in smoother hair.  Highly recommend.

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_headline: SOFT BONNET HAIRDRYER MOST CONVENIENT FOR ME
review_body: There aren't too many of the soft bonnet hairdryers available, so this is the one that I've had the most success with. I just wish it were easier to get replacement bonnets. I recently ordered 3 for the dryer that I already had, but the bonnets have been on "back order" for months, so I had to buy a whole new dryer.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I love this hair dryer.  There are more settings on this dryer than I have ever had.  It seems to dry my hair quicker

product_title: conair the power of pink ionic hair dryer
review_body: Its brand new, just as expected. Works perfectly! It fits all of the descriptions of when I purchased this product!

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_headline: Love it, especially the night light
review_body: Handy & convenient.  Love the cord hanger, I use it to hang my flat iron.  Very good product for the cost.

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_headline: Well designed, easy to use and easy to mount
review_body: This unit performs well and was easy to install.  We especially like the magnet "latch" which holds the dryer into the wall mount.  There are no plastic latch parts to break and you don't have to push the dryer into the mount to lock it into place.

product_title: conair 1875-watt ionic conditioning pro style hair dryer
review_body: I bought this for traveling. I have very thick hair that takes a long time to dry. This blow dryer is light weight but still does a good job of drying my hair.

product_title: conair 1875 watt mid-size hair dryer
review_body: I actually use this in the garage for drying glues, paints and finishes, replaced a unit I had for years, works great

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I bought thus dryer after using it at a hotel and decided I must have it.  I love the way the handle folds for easy packing into my suitcase, the cool button is easy to reach and my hair does not get frizzy!  Did I mention the retractable cord, another feature that I love!  I highly recommend this dryer!

product_title: oster tourmaline wall mount hair dryer 76932-710
review_body: I purchased as a back up for the last one I bought.  I shuts of when it gets to hot.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I have wavy hair that can be coaxed into curls or dried straight. This hairdryer works for both, and dries quickly whether for curly or for straight hair. The diffuser is wonderful. I can put my hair into it and my hair stays without blowing out of it. I get nice, voluminous curly hair. There is a wide range of  blower strength and heat available for this hairdryer, and for blowdrying straight, I need to use one notch below the maximum for both. Otherwise, my hair blows everywhere. Despite the blower strength, the hair dryer is pretty quiet and fairly light. The cord is nice and long. One last thing--I already knocked this hair dryer off my counter top, and it survived, seemingly without any problems.

product_title: t3 bespoke featherweight tourmaline professional ionic ceramic hair dryer model 83808-se
review_body: Love it!  Lighter th!an I thought a dryer could be.  Lives up to it's reputation...dries my  thick hair in record time

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: I'm traveling to Europe and I need a hair dryer with diffuser. I really like it! is not heavy, easy to handle. Is hot but you can change it to a low temperature. Best part, voltage for US and Europe. Just love it! very cute!

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: Lightweight and compact but powerful.  Used one in a hotel and immediately ordered one when I returned home. After years of using a hair dryer, this is myall time favorite.  I use it most every morning and love it.  Plus, it was reasonably priced.

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
review_body: This is not a compact travel hair dryer, but for home use it's sleek, lightweight, and powerful. It has all the features anyone would need, and it's easy to handle.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer is light and easy to use.  It met my expectations for drying medium length hair.  Very pleased.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Product was shipped promptly, is exactly as advertised. Not too much, not too little.....does the job to dry both my hair and my Chihuahua's after a bath.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I love the ionic conditioning feature of this hairdryer. It works! Other than that, it's pretty much your average hair dryer. I do keep accidentally turning it off because of the way the switch is located, but I expect I'll eventually adapt to that.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: My wife used this brand she saw at Disney while on vacation last year, she liked it enough that she decided she wanted one like it. After searching Amazon I was surprised to find it and order one. Works well and wife is happy. Seems to have a stronger air output than more expensive brands.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body:
I love this Vidal Sassoon dryer. Do not be fooled by its size and "full size". It is super light and dries my long hair in minutes. It has 2 heat settings and a hot and warm mode for drying and setting respectively. It has the option to turn the ions on and off which helps in a good blow dry. It comes with the nozzle attachment for focussed drying and prevention of frizzies. It also comes with the curl enhancer which helps in creating voluminous natural waves.

I was pleasantly surprised by how light it is and I manage to dry my hair with only one hand, while combing with the other hand.

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: My dream hair dryer....great product.  This hair dryer dries my hair quickly and gives me the smoothness that I want.  I enjoy using this hair dryer because it gets the job done in less time.  My hair is thick and it takes forever to dry but not with the Andis 82005 Professional 1875 Watt Ceramic Ionic Hair Dryer!!

product_title: panasonic kurukuru curling hair dryer eh-ka60-k black | ac100-120v/200-240v (japan model)
review_headline: I really like this product and it's dual voltage! =)
review_body: I bought this because I could not use my Conair Infiniti pro hot brush when I travel to other country. Fortunately, this performs much better than the conair hot brush. Aside from providing me a good styled-hair, my hair also shines better after using this. This product is very durable, it shows on the design. I've been using this regularly for three months now.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: We went out West traveling, I took this mini hair dryer. It worked great. It was small,but it worked better than my full size one at home. It didn't take up much room, and it was light. Would recommend this to anyone traveling . Perfect!

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: my wife is very happy with this purchase. I chose the product because the ad stated it was quiet, light powerful, professional quality. I have found everyting to be as advertised or better. hairblower is VERY QUIET and light to hold. these were impotant factors in choosing this prduct. price was very reasonable. delivery was quick. product was received in pristine condition. I highly recommend this product and seller

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body: Makes my hair shiny and soft.  I love this flat iron!  Great deal compared to other quality flat irons!  I would highly recommend to anyone.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body:
A hotel we recently stayed in had this hair dryer and I loved it so much, had to buy one when I got home.
Dries hair quickly and is nice and light too.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Andis RC-2 Ionic 1875W Ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Like the fact it is so compact that it is not difficult for travel as it takes up little room. Has a nice quiet sound and drys my hair very nicely.  Also the retractable cord it great so you don't have alot of cord that you have to wind up. This item also works well in a small drawer if being used at home.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: I felt this dryer was great for the money. It is not one of the best dryers out there but I felt it was sufficient in getting my hair dry in a short time period. I am not one of those folks who wants to wait very long for my hair to dry but I also didn't want to use a towel either. That's why I love this dryer. It is low cost which should be great for those people on a tight budget.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_headline: How do i use this product in Africa,already got one.
review_body:
I ordered for this hair dryer because of the advantages i saw.I have had a revlon dryer i had used for a long time and i guess i was due for a change.
I really looked out for one very good and with very advanced settings.I was able to get this dryer down to Africa,from the U.S.However,on receiving Infiniti Conair dryer;i was so anxious to use it.Like my custom has always been, i read the manual and was so suprised it was a 125volts!I was so dissappointed...i have not been able to use the product since i received it.
My question is how do i use the product since my country has a voltage of 220volts.I would really love to.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: Brought this to Thailand. Although there were blow dryers in the rooms, i always prefer to have one that is powerful enough to dry my hair quickly. This is awesome! Compact and worked great. Just make sure you read directions before using in a 220 v outlet!

product_title: blo and go by laurie coleman - portable hair dryer holder
review_body: My wife has M/S and she has difficulty holding the hair dryer. I was skeptical of this product working because it is one of those As seen on TV products. Boy, was I surprised. Out of the box, on the mirror, connected the hair dryer and hands free drying. We happened to have a full size mirror above the bathroom sink. Since the blo and go is a little heavy, I don't think it would work well on a small mirror of a medicine cabinet.

product_title: hot tools professional 1061 hard hat 1200 watt salon hair dryer
review_body: I had a little difficulty finding a surface to put it on that would match up with a seat that I had to be high enough up into the hood.  If you're short like me (5'2"), you can't just put in on the dining room table and use one of its chairs.  It would be helpful if the advertizing text stated how high the top of the inside of the hood was from the surface on which the dryer rested.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I really love this hair dryer. My old dryer died and I needed to get a new one quickly. I wanted one that was quiet and dry well. I have an Onei flat iron that I'm very happy with so I was happy to buy the hair dryer. I love the low volume of the hair dryer, love the ionic switch, and it really does dry well. I am happy with my purchase.

product_title: andis tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_headline: Best Hair Dryer My Wife ever Owned.
review_body:
Wife loves it as does my Daughter. Bought another one for her.
Fast Drying With out the FRizzzzz..!! Light and easy to hold.
Great Price, Fast Ship. Great Product.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I was so tired of cheap hair dryers breaking and decided to purchase this dryer. I am very pleased with this hair dryer. It is much quieter than most dryers and dries hair quickly. I would recommend!

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body:
My daughter had gotten an ionic hair dryer and told me how much she enjoyed it. So, though my hair is much shorter than hers, I decided to give it a try. I ordered the Onei MK_ll, a different brand than my daughters. I loved it the first time I used it. I color my hair and it is on the thin side and this dryer tames the frizzies and adds body and shine.
My daughter tried it when she came to visit and, of course, loved it!! So--I bought her one, too. She claims that it is light, easy to handle, dries her hair quicker and over all, does a much better job than her old one.
The delivery was prompt and product was in good condition. No problems.

product_title: pro beauty tools pbdr5886 professional travel hair dryer, white and black
review_body: I bought this dryer because it came with a diffuser and I needed a dual voltage dryer for travel to Europe. It folds down and is great for travel. It works well on both 110 and 220V. Reviews of other dryers said that they only worked on high when using 220V, but this has both low and high on both voltages. The diffuser does a decent job of diffusing the air and dried my hair well without firzzing it. I only plan to use it for travel and only used it for 2 weeks overseas, so I can't vouch for its durability. At this time, though, I am very satisfied with it.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body: I was little skepital for spending $70 for a hair dryer. I thought there are no difference between $30 dryer and $70 dryer. This hair dryer is very quite, light weight, dry quick and well made. I got it for two weeks now so far so good!

product_title: andis 33295 hangup pro turbo 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_body: This is my third Andis Hangup Pro Turbo Hair Dryer of this model over the past 15 years or so. My husband and I use it on a daily basis and love the convenience of having it on the wall for easy access. Product is very reliable. Must keep dust screen in back of handheld unit clean. It is very easy to clean as it unscrews. Wall mount has a reset button if unit shuts down due to overheating which doesn't usually occur if screen is kept clean. Would purchase another of this product when needed.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Bought this hair dryer for my wife to replace her old one that was starting to physically wear out. This one dried her hair several minutes faster than the old one (even with hair/dust cleaned out of the filter). Highly recommend, the finish is a soft touch / satiny plastic paint / coating that feels good to hold in your hand.

product_title: professional lightweight hair dryer
review_body: This is a a wonderful dryer, and it didn't cost an arm and a leg. Why didn't I buy it earlier?

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: After much heavy use by two people daily, my original Remington Ac2015 finally bit the dust.  It lasted a good long time.  I loved it so much I ordered the same one as a replacement.  I didn't even see what else was out there, which I never do - I'm the research queen!  I figured why look for something else when this one has everything.  It's quiet, has perfect temperatures and it dries fast.  Leaves my hair silky and shiny. It is a bit heavier than some but you get used to it quickly.  Feels solid and has a nice no slip texture plus an extra long cord.  Highly recommended.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body: The dryer is quiet and powerful. There are three heat speed settings and one without heat. The dryer has silky-touch surface for smooth handling. We have used Andis hair dryers for years. They are used in upscale hotels.

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline lightweight professional hair dryer, matte black
review_headline: Dries my hair very fast - hair is definitely smoother and shinier.
review_body: This is a great product.  I didn't really believe all the Ionic hype, but it really does seem to make a difference.  My hair is smoother and softer and dries in much less time (I'd say 30-40% faster).  It is a very hot hair dryer, so be sure to keep it away from your scalp and face.  But, I love it!

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, black
review_headline: the best investment so fare in this year
review_body: excellent my clients love the way theirs hair look and so fare the best investment that I made this year

product_title: conair 1875-watt ionic conditioning pro style hair dryer
review_headline: Conair Ion Shine 1875-Watt Hair Dryer - Red
review_body: I got this for my daughter cause i have one and she loved it...it got here fast and in perfect condition...she loves it...loves the power.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: Love the dryer. A funny thing though. I have short hair and the attachment that fluff's up your hair, I have not mastered using it yet. I am afraid I will knock  myself out. My hairdresser and friends laugh at me when I tell them about it. Otherwise, easy to handle and quick to dry.

product_title: andis 1875-watt tourmaline ceramic ionic styling hair dryer
review_body: I'm happy with this product. I have long thick hair that normally takes forever to dry. This makes it easier and faster to dry my hair. I'm very satisfied with the Andis Dryer.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: This product got fast in a new not opened package with instructions and everything, it is usefull and very light i love it!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: I bought it for my girlfriend, she loves it
review_body: I picked this hairdryer because of the high reviews on Amazon, and I was not disappointed.  My girlfriend loves this hairdryer.  It feels like a quality item when you hold it in your hands.

product_title: conair 1875 watt mid-size hair dryer
review_body: This dryer is a great device and works well. It's small and can easily be transported while travelling. It's also powerful and helps to dry hair out.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I bought this for my 5 yea old daughter because she always wants to do things for herself and I wanted to encourage her independence. This is so small and light. She is able to handle it easily and even though I still have to watch her and help with the use of a hairbrush, she is well on her way to independence. It is very powerful for its size and comes with a nice bag and accessories.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body:
I needed a basic, reliable hair dryer. That is what I got, and I did not over-pay for it.

The option for air-only is convenient - in a pinch I was able to dry out a nearly-ruined paycheck without damaging it.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This is a nice blow dryer. It works well, is very solidly built (somewhat heavy for its size, but that doesn't bother me). It is comfortable to hold and just the right size (medium...not to small or big). The highest heat setting is too hot for me (which is a change from my previous blow dryer, but tells me it has good heating elements), so I keep it on medium. For some reason, I thought it was black when I purchased it, but it is a very pretty dark plum color, with pink accents...very "stylish"! :) Oh, and I love the "cool shot" feature!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I have very thick, curly hair and the power in this dryer does the job in great time!  Thank you!

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer; pink
review_body: I love this hair dryer.  I love the retractable cord.  The high speed is great!  I was surprised by how quiet it is.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: I love this hair dryer.  It fits well in my hand.  Drys my hair beautifully and quickly.  I have fine hair and this dryer is not "too much".  It has several speeds and heat options.  Would definitely recommend.

product_title: hot tools professional 1600 watt super quiet turbo lightweight hair dryer
review_body: We liked this so much, we bought another for our daughter's bathroom so we could get ours back! Very quiet and a reasonable value. The wattage is fine because any higher just cooks your hair anyways..!  Time will tell with durability..

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: The quality of ionized hair-drying you get with this dryer is no less than top of the line salon dryers like CHI. The build quality of this dryer is better than my CHI that died on me. When I opened the CHI to attempt to repair it, I couldn't believe how cheaply made it was and I was amazed at what the retail markup must be. It's like jewelry, they must be making a fortune...The only reason to buy a CHI over this dryer is if you are a stylist and you have an image to uphold, i.e. pretentious clientele that would look down on you for using a Remington.

product_title: turbo power twin turbo 2600 hair dryer
review_body: I love this powerful light weight dryer. It leaves my hair shinny with lots of body. My granddaughter recommended it to me. She loves her dryer also.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: No complaints. It's light and not too noisy. It has 2 blowing speeds and 2 levels of heating which is enough for me to adjust as I need. I am using it for the last 6 month with no problems so far. I got it thru Amazon and happy with it.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: I put this in my gym bag and the features make this perfect with folding and retractable cord. Love it.

product_title: john frieda(r) jf1r 1,875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I would highly recommend this. It is really powerful which is handy for someone with frizzy hair like mine. Good value for such a good product.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord keeper 2-in-1 hair dryer, black
review_headline: best dryer I have ever had
review_body: Works great @ just the right temp.  Hair never looked better with just a brush and dry.  Love the retractable cord!  Definitely the best dryer I've ever had and at a great price to boot!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Hardest blowing hair dryer for the price.  This is the second one we bought. Works great!  Can't go wrong. x

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_headline: just answering a very dumb question
review_body: i use it to dry my hair.What a  stupid question or do you have other uses for a wall hanging hair dryer

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: I have very thick wavy hair, and this has been the best hair drier ever. I bought two in fact so that I do not have to carry with me when I visit with my friends.

product_title: conair pro styler ionic conditioning hair dryer
review_headline: Perfect with good amount of settings
review_body: I bought this Conair when my old one finally blew.  After 10 year mind you.  I have short hair but need something with a couple heat and blow settings.  This does the trick.  There are two speed settings and three heat.  That gives you enough combinations to do the trick.  Takes me only 5 minutes to dry and style my hair.  It also has a "cool" button which is easy to reach.  The hook on the handle makes it easy to hang if you need to.

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body: After my blow dreyer of 10 years stared to loose it's "umff" I turned to amazon of course so look through some reviews and came across this blow dreyer, my hair stylist, who is a trusted friend even recommended it, and of course even she couldn't beat the price, it works really well, my hair is much smoother after using this dreyer versus my old one, it was definitely time for an upgrade. The power is great and I didn't find it to be to heavy. I have long fine hair and it dried very quickly so that's nice considering I'm a mom with a 14 mo old who doesn't have to much primp time in the mornings :)  I would definitely recommend this dreyer!

product_title: turbo power twinturbo 2800 coldmatic hair dryer 314
review_body:
Once I used this hair dryer, I noticed how quickly, efficiently and with less noise dried my hair. I can definitely see a difference with the efficiency when compared to hotel and hair dryers sold at a local drug store.

The delivery of the dryer was as promised, delivered promptly.

I would recommed this vendor and product to my friends.

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body: I recently bought the HSI flat iron.  I liked it so much I bought the dryer.  I like the dryer just a much.  It is light weight and powerful.  I have long wavy hair and this dryer works quickly without adding frizz.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_headline: Great hair dryer for a great price!
review_body: This is a wonderful product. I like how it has a "coo/warm/hot" switch AND a "low/high" switch and not just one switch making you choose low and cool or hot and high. I also love the little attachment it comes with to give a more concentrated blow to a specific section of hair. I would definitely buy this product again.

product_title: salon sundry professional bonnet style hood 1,000 watt salon hair dryer - multiple colors available
review_headline: Salon Quality at an affordable price
review_body: Definitely more convenient thatn going to a salon all the time. I love doing my own hair at home now and this has allowed me to spend less time blow drying and styling it.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_body:
Love this blowdryer! Compact, yet powerful!
Typically I can't find anything that blows the air strong enough, this is by far the best dryer I have had.

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: This hair dryer is powerful, quiet by hair dryer standards, and has a solid quality feel to it.  I spent a lot of time researching different options and am happy with my purchase.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer; pink
review_body: Arrived in time. I've only had it for one month so I'm not sure how long it will last but so far I've had no problems. This hair dryer is great. I'm not sure if it is as good as the more expensive brands as I have never paid over $20 for one but it definitely gets the job done. Oh and I looove the retractable cord.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_body: Great dryer if you don't like the newer types which have gadgets added to them and are very powerful.  This has a powerful setting but not extremely strong so that your hair is getting a beating.

product_title: t3 featherweight luxe hair dryer
review_body: I love it, my hair is so shiny! it dries faster and I love the attachments, I use the diffuser for my curly hair and the other for my daughters' straight hair, all around great product.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: oh my I am so pleased. I had my other Vidal Sassoon hair dryer for 22 years. it went through me and 2 daughters and still works. I don't think it gets as hot as it used to, but never the less. This blower has large shoes to fill. if it last half as long I will be very pleased.

product_title: br beauty meredith 880w salon hair dryer with casters
review_body: this does what you think it will, dries hair. My wife likes it and she and her sisters use it all the time.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: Love this hair dryer, light weight lots of power!! Great value for the money.  I have paid alot more for other hair dryers with less power.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: NO complaints here! I say buy this one . Its a great hairdryer. and I go thru them. SO good product!!

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_headline: revlon rv408 1875 watt full size turbo dryer, black
review_body: This is a great dryer.  The three settings, low, medium and high allow for more flexibility when styling your hair.  My hair  is fine so the low and  medium setting work great for me!

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline lightweight professional hair dryer, red (3600)
review_body: this hair dryer was worth the money. The quality is good without breaking the wallet. Also, the size is optimal, very small, easy to handle and operate.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Used first at a hotel inFL.
review_body: Ordered it online as ssonas I returned.  I love the retractable feature. It is the best hair dryer I've ever had.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: I bought this for my daughter 5 months ago. She loves it especially over the one she used to borrow from me. It dries her hair very fast and the folding handle and retractable cord make it great for travel. I am thinking of getting one for myself once mine dies knowing this is a good one.

product_title: twin turbo 3200 ceramic and ionic professional hair dryer, 1900 watt
review_body: Great price, great item. She loves it. This is professional quality , she uses it at home and for work as well.

product_title: infiniti by conair i series folding handle hair dryer
review_body: I really like that the cord retracts.  Good force of air.  Nice that you can change speeds and/or heat settings.  I like that you can set it to cool or if you are using a heat you could do a blast of cool with the button.  Slightly heavier than I would like but not unreasonably so.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: I love this little hairdryer.....travels well, small, and lightweight.  It is powerful enough for me, and has diffuser, too.  Has 2 settings for temp.  Good value and easy to handle.

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: I am in hotel industry - I could buy thousands of these. Super cheap, very quiet, with a nice night light, barely use any electricity, great heat, simple to use, VERY comfortable in hand. I've never seen a guest use their own brought hair-dryer. they ALWAYS elect to use this - and it's obviously installed very conveniently in the bathroom - good screws and installation instructions that come with it. Never falls off, always there when you need your hair fluffy.

product_title: conair pro styler bonnet hair dryer, white
review_body: I love to keep my hair looking shinny and healthy and in the winter it gets dull and in the summer it looks fried.  I live in California.  This neat little gaget givese the conveinceof doing a deep condition at home for just the cost of the conditioner and a shower cap instead of paying those heavy prices at the salon. and it onlytakes 15 minutes and I can do it my PJ's instead of getting all dressed up and and over paying a salon for what I can do for a few bucks.

product_title: remington d3710 ceramic fast finish dual fan turbo hair dryer, 1875 watts
review_body:
Hey All,
I am not so blessed with fine, thin hair that unless its pinned up and perfectly coifed its a frizzy, fly away mess. This hair dryer changed that! With its settings and cool air, I can dry it and leave it. No more constant pinned up hair. I can let my locks down! SO yes. I highly recommend it. Its not perfect, Its a little bulky and takes some getting used too (you might have to change how you dry your hair) And I don't recommend traveling with it. BUT for a good stay at home dryer that works like a charm, has easy to use settings I love it -So much that I sent one to my sister :)

product_title: hsi professional hair dryer d-2200 with turbo ionic and infrared technology
review_body:
This Hair Dryer has a nice color, and has been working so good.
So far so good!!!
The turbo velocity is quick drying. Is comfortable to use and easy to handling.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: For a small, compact hair dryer its great for traveling! I have little time and thick, curly hair and it does a great job and very powerful. Reasonable price, traveling case and attachments, very happy!

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Having used numerous blow dryers in my business, I have to say this has been one of my favorites for so many reasons. It's lightweight and I can actually carry on a conversation with my clients without having to lower the speed...love the design! I highly recommend this product and would purchase again.

product_title: conair vagabond folding handle 1875 watt compact hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: I just love my Conair 1875 Blow Dryer.  It's more powerful than any blow dryer that I've ever purchased.  I have long hair that generally takes 15 minutes to dry with my Revlon 1875.  The Conair is three times more powerful and dries my hair in less than 5 minutes.  And it's great for travel because it folds in half and is very, very light in weight.  I happily give this dryer 5 stars and would give it 10 if the option was available.

product_title: revlon essentials 1875w fast dry hair dryer, rv408
review_body: Works well for my wife, it's not fancy, but it does the job well. If you're looking for an inexpensive hair dryer, this is the one.

product_title: andis micro turbo hair dryer
review_headline: It's Andis at a good price. Done and done.
review_body: Andis makes a great product, and I have a white Andis full-sized dryer for the house, but I needed a smaller one for on-the-road travel in my semi truck. This also has dual voltage for overseas travel, so YAY! Get one.

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: The dual wattage feature saves you from having to use a converter. The unit is very small yet plenty powerful, and way better than the dryers provided in hotels. For my hairstyle, the air concentrator attachment is a must. I'm very pleased with this dryer.

product_title: onei mk-ii air ionique hair dryer with ionic generator for professional blowouts
review_body:
Salon quality dryer. Great size and color. Love that its so quite. I've had to adapt to the controls being on the outside of the handle.(my old one was on the inside) but it's well worth it. My hair dries so fast I have extra time in the mornings.. Love it, Love it, Love it.
I would reccomend this dryer to anyone that wants a quality dryer. Four year warranty. Where can you find that on a hair dryer?

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_headline: Compact for a full-sized hair dryer
review_body: I used the 'soft touch' black version of this hair dryer at a high-end resort hotel once and I was immediately in love, so I had to get this (white) one on Amazon. It had so much power for such a small dryer!! Highly recommended.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Love how quiet this dryer is.  It feels good in the hand however it is a bit on the heavy side.  You get used to it after using it for awhile.  Other than the weight issue it is an amazing dryer!

product_title: conair soft bonnet hair dryer 1 ea
review_body: great product I recommend everyone get one. It is a good compact devise that is easy to travel with, you can put it under your seat or just hold it in your lap.

product_title: conair pro styler ionic conditioning hair dryer
review_body: it does a good job in a short amount of time and that it exactly why i bought this.  good dryer

product_title: conair wallmount 1600 watt hair dryer with led night light; white
review_body: Had one that finally wore out and loved it so much bought another one just like it! You don't have to worry where to put it, it's on the wall!

product_title: turbo power 3200 twin turbo hair dryer, black
review_body: I have thick curly hair that I straighten twice a week. This hair dryer makes it easy! I highly recommend it!

product_title: sunbeam 1632-040 global economizer hair dryer
review_body: Great dryer to replace an old wall mounted one. Heat settings are very good and installation was easy and fast

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I truly don't understand anyone who would pay more or could want more than what this hair dryer offers.  It's fantastic.  The settings, noise level, weight, what it does to my hair - all of it.  It's great.

product_title: pro beauty tools professional turbo hair dryer

review_body:

It serves its purpose well...

product_title: extracompact twinturbo 3500 2000 watt compact professional hair dryer
review_body: I hesitated to spend this much money on a hair dryer, and I am so happy I did.  I have always purchased the cheaper drug store ones and they not worth it- my hair is so much smoother and healthier with this dryer!

product_title: infinity pro by conair 1875 watt hair dryer - purple
review_body: Loved the color, works amazingly well. Dries your hair very fast. I love that there are multiple setting for temperature and speed

product_title: conair 1875 watt tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I am a hairstylist, and I love this dryer! It is lightweight, and it dries my hair incredibly fast. The cord is a little short for professional use, but I love it for myself!

product_title: pibbs ttec8012 twin turbo 3800 professional ionic and ceramic hair dryer, black, 2100 watt
review_body: this hairdryer is a super product!  i would recommend this item to everyone! it is light weight and has a strong enough power to take my frizzes away in just a few minutes..

product_title: conair pro styler bonnet hair dryer, white
review_body: This hair dryer replaced one my Mom had been using for the past 25 years or so. I finally convinced her it was time when the old one was broken in so many places I just could not fix it anymore though the motor was fine.  She loves the new one because it resembles the old one in so mnay ways but with improvements.  She is delighted with this Conair HH320LR.. Could not be more pleased.

product_title: travel smart by conair dual voltage 1875 watt hair dryer
review_headline: Great Hair Dryer for Long Hair
review_body: This was perfect for my trip.  Even when I did not realize I had to turn the dial to a different voltage in Singapore - it just flipped the breaker and did not burn out the dryer.  When I was finally smart enough to realize I needed to select the voltage I could not have been happier.  I have long hair and like to dry my hair upside down at times.  I hate when my hair gets caught in the fan.  This dryer had the perfect cover and my hair never got caught or tangled.  It folds up for easy packing too.

product_title: andis 1600w quiet hangup hair dryer with night light
review_body: I am very happy with this hair dryer. I must agree with others, though, the night light is very bright. I read other reviewers who said it was bright, but I couldn't imagine such a small light being so bright. My dryer is in a bathroom off the bedroom and it lights up all the bathroom and part of the bedroom. I covered the light with 2 thickness of duck tape and it is still very bright. I like having the night light, but it could be a "bit" dimmer. The dryer works fine and I like having a place to hang the cord on the dryer so it doesn't lay on the sink. That is a great feature.

product_title: conair minipro tourmaline ceramic styler / hair dryer; pink
review_body: Fantastic little hair dryer I bought for my trip later this year. I've only been able to work it on the 250 setting here in Australia, but it seems great so far. Make sure if you're Australian and you plug it in with the adapter that you don't put it on high! I didn't read the instructions and nearly blew it up haha. Can only be used on low here, but that's fine as it's for my trip to the US anyways. Was quite powerful and I think it'll be perfect.

product_title: conair 1875 watt cord-keeper hair dryer; pink
review_body: I use this hairdryer 3-4 times a week. Great power and is quite nice...plus it's in my favorite color, red.

product_title: vidal sassoon vs547 1875w tourmaline ceramic hair dryer
review_body: I always bought this particular model at Wal Mart.  Wal Mart no longer carries this dryer.  This dryer lasts much longer then any other hair dryer I have used.  That is why I keep buying the Vidal Sassoon Ion dryer.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: Its good, dryes my hair really fast and its cute too! I got 2 one for me and one for my friend she loves it as well!

product_title: t3 featherweight journey travel hair dryer
review_body: I bought this for a trip to Italy and it worked great for me.  It's very small but also very powerful.  I have a lot of thick curly hair so a need a good hairdryer.  I also bought the diffuser attachment.  I actually think it's better than the hairdryer I use at home!  You will need an adaptor but it has a voltage converter so it works much better than hairdryers that don't have a voltage converter.  Worth the extra bucks.

product_title: conair infiniti pro 1875 watt salon performance ac motor styling hair dryer with twist folding handle, blue
review_body:
I first used this hair dryer at a friend's cabin and I was hooked. The motor is quiet, the dryer itself is pretty light, the blow is intense, and the best part? It gets super hot. You can barely hold your hand under it for too long. I immediately went home and bought it online. I have a medium bob and the dry time was cut in half. My hair seemed fuller and shinier. My roommate was so jealous that she ran out and bought one as well. We both are big into hair tools and are now the biggest fan of this hair dryer. I came upon it in Costco for such a good deal, that I bought another one!

The only downside to this dryer, is that it does not come with the defuser attachment. Please, Conair, gimme a defuser!

I would recommend this dryer to anyone with hair.

product_title: andis pro style soft grip 1600 watt hair dryer
review_headline: It was just what my wife wanted.
review_body: My wife used it at a hotel for several days and wanted one for home use.  It met and exceeded her expectations

product_title: andis 1875 watt professional ceramic ionic hair dryer
review_body: I purchased this hairdryer because it's the one my beautician uses !I LOVED how fast it was to blowdry my hair !!I got the travel one too !! LOVE IT LOVE !! FAST SHIPPING TOO !! THANK YOU !!

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: One of the best hair dryers!
review_body: I LOVE this hair dryer! I bought one for myself and others as gifts after trying this at a Marriott hotel. It dries my hair so fast and for the price you can't beat that! It is light and love the retractible cord. After a while you have to push the cord in yourself but I've had it for over a year and use it everyday so it is definitely durable. I wish it came with a diffuser and other nozzles like some of the other hairdryers but if your looking for an inexpensive but reliable product, this is it!

product_title: andis hangup 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_headline: Have had this dryer since 2005, it's great
review_body: After 8 years this dryer finally became brittle and began chipping near the fan so it was time for a new one.  I had no reservations  buying this same make & model..matter of fact I bought two this time....one will stay in the luggage ready to hit the road.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: works great for me, i dont need anything fancy but this one has everything i needed. the attachments help for random things as well

product_title: ovente seductive ceramic ionic tourmaline lightweight professional hair dryer, red (3600)
review_body: Dries my thick hair in no time.  I love it and wish I would have bought it sooner.  It's worth the money.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_body: This does exactly what I need it to, it's really quiet which is nice, but still does it's job. Quick drying process and I have notoriously hard to dry hair, so I'm please with this purchase. It doesn't get too hot like other dryers I haven't had any issues with burning myself by staying on one spot too long.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_body: This is one of the best blow dryers we have purchased.  I am going to buy another one to keep in our travel bag.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer
review_body: Works as advertised.  Can't beat the price for a quality product such as this one.  One of the better buys out there.

product_title: hello kitty 1875 watt hair dryer
review_headline: Daughter brought me for a joke and I love it
review_body: It has a lot of power.  Easy to hold and small enough to be easy to pack for a trip

product_title: andis 81290 tourmaline ionic/ceramic 1875 watt hair dryer
review_body: The settings are wonderful and my hair did feel a lot softer after using! The heat setting are great too... I like the option of having cool, warm and hot... the dryer is super powerful and definitely cut down on drying time. And the retractable cord is great! I would definitely recommend this blow dryer to a friend!

product_title: revlon 1875w compact travel hair dryer
review_body: ive always really liked the travel sized blow dryers. and this one is wonderful not to heavy and drys my hair in half the time.

product_title: remington ac2015 t|studio salon collection pearl ceramic hair dryer, deep purple
review_headline: Smooth hair with volume, and my eardrums are intact.
review_body: My old hair dryer died a rather spectacular death with sparks and smoke.  I hadn't researched hair dryers before, and I only wanted something that would dry my hair.  So I randomly picked a conair from a local store.  I used it a few times and was not happy with the results for the conair.  It turned out to be loud as all get out, and my hair turned out flat.  I felt like I was in a deafening windstorm.  So now I had a criteria for research:  Something that was quiet and didn't blow my hair into a limp state.  That's what lead me to this Remington.  It shipped and got here quickly.  Yes, it smelled a bit funny as all new hair appliances do when first used, but I was impressed.  It was easy to handle.  I liked that I didn't have to keep sliding buttons up and down to change settings like my old hair dryer.  It was relatively quiet as hair dryers go.  The drying process went very quickly.  My hair had plenty of volume with a smooth, soft feeling when all was said and done.  I'm very happy.  No flat hair and my ears aren't ringing.  I highly recommend the Remington hair dryer.

product_title: andis hangup 1600w wall mount hair dryer
review_body:
Googled hair dryer, found it at Amazon.com one of my trusted sites. Ordered it and got it 4 days ago. It is better than the old one as this model has an led night light built in. Great Product. Working fine.

Thanks
Amazon

product_title: conair bb075w pro blackbird 2000-watt hair dryer
review_body: I love the blow dryer it works great. it was a little heavier than I thought it would be but is great.

product_title: conair corp pers care 146np conair ionic conditioning 1875-watt hair dryer

review_body: Product arrived as expected and was a bargain price. I just used it for the first time and am very happy with purchase. I kept it on low setting, which was enough for my hair. The cooling button works fast to cool off curls created by your brush. Would highly recommend item.

product_title: andis 1875-watt fold-n-go ionic hair dryer , silver/black (80020)
review_headline: Great hair dryer to reduce frizz and gentle on hair
